channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

title.a: Knockdown - Major Emergency Structure Fire 12/23/2023 INC#0148

item.description: Knockdown - Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0148; 03:34AM; 2800 N Division St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RUD6ez; #CypressPark; 157 LAFD Firefighters took just 84 minutes in largely defensive operations to access, confine and largely extinguish heavy fire in an 11,120 square foot one-story industrial building housing a media production and event space know as L..A. River Studios. The site had just concluded a public (wedding?) event when the fire erupted. All attendees and staff safely evacuated the facility. Firefighters will remain at scene into the morning to extinguish hotspots. No injuries have been reported. The fire cause is under active investigation. LAFD Public Information Officer Captain Cody Weireter is on scene to assist the media. ; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; T50 E250 RA850 E44 E55 RA55 E201 E1 T1 BC2 BC1 E56 E42 E4 E220 T20 E235 T35 E212 T12 CM22 SQ21 EM11 BC11 T3 E203 E3 UR3 HR3 RA3 RA803 UR88 BC5 E20 RA1 E35 E12 E211 T11 E202 T2 AR1 EM14 BC14 PI3 SO1 E29 E33 T27 E227 T29 E229 E61 T21 E221 HE1 EA1; CH9; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0148; 02:10AM; 2800 N Division St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RUD6ez; #CypressPark; PRELIM: Defensive operations on a 200' x 200' one-story movie studio well involved, with fire through the roof.; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; T50 E250 RA850 E44 E55 RA55 E201 E1 T1 BC2 BC1 E56 E42 E4 E220 T20 E235 T35 E212 T12 CM22 SQ21 EM11 BC11 T3 E203 E3 UR3 HR3 RA3 RA803 UR88 BC5 E20 RA1 E35 E12 E211 T11 E202 T2 AR1 EM14 BC14 PI3 ; CH9; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update - #RoyalOakFire - Major Emergency Structure Fire 12/22/2023 INC#1162

item.description: Update - #RoyalOakFire - Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#1162; 06:15PM; 15837 W Royal Oak Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NDPsFm; #Encino; LAFD operations will continue into the night, to cool hotspots and complete the fire cause investigation within the now heavily damaged and physically unstable structure. The homeowner has confirmed the three story residence - undergoing a major renovation, has 28,000 square-feet of floorspace. The (unspecified number or craft) workers who were on site when the fire started, escaped unharmed, and no firefighters have been injured.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; E288 E88 T88 E83 E109 RA99 E278 T78 RA78 BC10 BC14 T39 E239 CM42 CM40 UR88 HA6 H6 E90 E93 E293 T93 E87 SQ87 EM14 BC12 T89 E289 E89 UR89 HR3 BC5 SO1 HA7 H7 HA3 H3 HA5 H5 EA1 AR1 HE1 EX2 T27 E227 T61 E261 E11 E205 T75 E275 PI3; CH8; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - #RoyalOakFire - Major Emergency Structure Fire 12/22/2023 INC#1162

item.description: Knockdown - #RoyalOakFire - Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#1162; 05:44PM; 15837 W Royal Oak Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NDPsFm; #Encino; 133 LAFD Firefighters took 3 hours in largely defensive operations to access, confine and extinguish the bulk of deeply entrenched and stubborn fire within the (as much as a 17,000 square-foot?) three-story home of fire origin that was in the framing and wrapped stage of construction. No injury. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; E288 E88 T88 E83 E109 RA99 E278 T78 RA78 BC10 BC14 T39 E239 CM42 CM40 UR88 HA6 H6 E90 E93 E293 T93 E87 SQ87 EM14 BC12 T89 E289 E89 UR89 HR3 BC5 SO1 HA7 H7 HA3 H3 HA5 H5 EA1 AR1 HE1 EX2 T27 E227 T61 E261 E11 E205 T75 E275 PI3; CH8; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

#RoyalOakFire Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#1162; 04:45PM; 15837 W Royal Oak Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NDPsFm; #Encino; With 133 LAFD personnel now assigned and transitioning from defensive (exterior) to limited offensive (interior) operations against deeply entrenched and stubborn fire, this incident has escalated to Major Emergency status. The flames remain confined within the structure of fire origin (roughly estimated to be as much as a 17,000 square-foot) three-story home under construction in the framing and wrapped stage, surrounded by scaffolding on bare earth. No injuries have been reported. LAFD Public Information Officer Captain Cody Weireter is en route to assist media. His ETA is 5:15 PM.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; E288 E88 T88 E83 E109 RA99 E278 T78 RA78 BC10 BC14 T39 E239 CM42 CM40 UR88 HA6 H6 E90 E93 E293 T93 E87 SQ87 EM14 BC12 T89 E289 E89 UR89 HR3 BC5 SO1 HA7 H7 HA3 H3 HA5 H5 EA1 AR1 HE1 EX2 T27 E227 T61 E261 E11 E205 T75 E275; CH9; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

#RoyalOakFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1162; 03:30PM; 15837 W Royal Oak Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NDPsFm; #Encino; With 109 LAFD personnel now assigned (including *three* LAFD helicopters), firefighters continue in a well coordinated defensive fire attack against heavy fire involving the second and third floors of a large three-story home under construction (framed & wrapped and surrounded by scaffolding on bare earth). No evacuation. No injuries reported.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; E288 E88 T88 E83 E109 RA99 E278 T78 RA78 BC10 BC14 T39 E239 CM42 CM40 UR88 HA6 H6 E90 E93 E293 T93 E87 SQ87 EM14 BC12 T89 E289 E89 UR89 HR3 BC5 SO1 HA7 H7 HA3 H3 HA5 H5 EA1 AR1; CH9; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire 12/22/2023 INC#1162

item.description: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1162; 03:00PM; 15837 W Royal Oak Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NDPsFm; #Encino; *Address Corrected From High Knoll Road* Now a Greater Alarm fire with 92 LAFD personnel assigned (including one LAFD helicopter for aerial reconnaissance and command support) in a defensive fire attack against heavy fire involving the second and third floors of a large three-story home under construction (framed & wrapped). No evacuation. No injuries reported. ; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; E288 E88 T88 E83 E109 RA99 E278 T78 RA78 BC10 BC14 T39 E239 CM42 CM40 UR88 HA6 H6 E90 E93 E293 T93 E87 SQ87 EM14 BC12 T89 E289 E89 UR89 HR3 BC5; CH9; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1162; 02:43PM; 15818 W High Knoll Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/4azQaNG; #Encino; *Address Tentative*. PRELIM: Large three-story home under construction (framed & wrapped), with the second floor well involved with fire. ; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; E288 E88 T88 E83 E109 RA99 E278 T78 RA78 BC10 BC14 T39 E239 CM42 CM40; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Contained - Structure Fire; INC#0432; 08:48AM; 1000 W Sunset Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/4aeD60n; #Downtown; 42 LAFD Firefighters took just 76 minutes in defensive firefighting operations, to confine and largely extinguish stubborn flames in a vacant and boarded 7,400 square foot two-story office building, the site of previous fires. No injury. LAFD personnel will remain at the scene for an extended period today, utilizing LAFD heavy equipment to abate physical hazards and secure the structure in coordination with the City's Department of Building & Safety. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR14 AR21 AR34 AR38 BC1 CM22 E20 E203 E220 E3 E4 EA1 EX2 HE1 RA3 RA803 T20 T3; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0432; 07:32AM; 1000 W Sunset Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/4aeD60n; #Downtown; PRELIM: Defensive firefighting operations at a vacant and boarded two-story office building, the site of previous fires, that has fire showing.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 E11 E203 E220 E3 E4 RA3 RA803 SQ21 T20 T3; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey
